resources.string: There was an error initializing the YouTubePlayer (%1$s)

This is the only TechFest by the post-graduates of CA Dept, National Institute of Technology, Durgapur, is a melting pot of the technically inclined students from colleges all over Eastern India. Not only Eastern India but other premiere institutes of India and abroad. The three-day fiesta consists of events spanning every possible field, ranging from coding events to challenge the hardcore coders, to providing a platform for all to showcase their hidden talents. From quizzes on diverse topics including technologies, general knowledge and computer applications to painting on your friend’s body and performing your heart out for the immensely cheerful crowd – it’s a fest that’ll pop up your adrenaline rush. There’s room for all- the coder, the dancer, the painter, the shutterbug or the super-nerd. With such innumerous events and participation from colleges all over India, Technoshine leads the light of instilling a culture of science, technology and innovation among the youth of the nation.

For participating you need to register on www.cadnitd.co.in

 Can your facebook friends help you win a contest? Show us your popularity by attaining the maximum numbers of likes on your picture, or by depicting the best thought on the theme provided. Click!! Click!! 

 1. You need to submit your photograph between 19th september, 2016 and 24th september, 2016.

 2. The Submission must be a digital photo clicked by yourself.

 3. The Submission must be entrant's original creation and owned one hundred percent (100%) by the entrant.

 4. The Submission should not have been submitted previously in a promotion of any kind or exhibited or displayed publicly through any means.

 5. The Submission must demonstrate one of the following contest themes: Street Portrait, Macro Focus (small things images).

 6. Picture will be uploaded on our facebook page www.facebook.com/technoshinex.6, you have to get likes on your picture on our facebook page as much as possible before 24th september 2016.

 7. You have to like Technoshine X.6 page and then your likes will be consider.

 8. Winners will be decided with weightage of 50% from number of Likes received on your photo on our FB page and weightage of 50% will be on our judges decision, respectively.

Keep Calm And Google

 Is your Google-fu strong enough to win you a prize? Surf the internet and bring us the correct answer for the given question. Only a correct answer will help you clear the levels. Aim to reach the highest level possible!


 This event is going to start from 19th september,2016 to 23rd september,2016 till Midnight

 					Awesome Cash Prizes to Win.

 					Play Nethunt in TechnoshineX.6 android app or @ www.cadnitd.co.in

If keyboards could talk, words that stung.

 It’s time for you to inspire the folks by writing your hearts out. Show us your creativity, write something out of the box on any of the topics provided, and lead among the pack of participants. Imagine, Implement and Inspire!!

 1. Participants are supposed to register at www.cadnitd.co.in. Entries from unregistered participants will not be considered for evaluation.

 2. Participants have to send their write-ups as .doc/.docx files to inspireindiats@gmail.com between 19th september,2016 to 23rd september, 2016 till 12 PM.

 3. Participants must choose any one of the following:
 				A story on "Words that stung" (Max Word Count- 500)
 				A poem on "A magic spell" (Max Word Count- 500)
 				An article on "Smartphones or Smartbrains?"
 				An article on "India's presence on the global landscape" (Max Word Count-500)
 Note: Please give apt titles for the poem and short story 

 4. Each of the entries should be an original creation of the participant.

Code your way to Victory A coding competition not only for the geeks but also for the novice. Code, successfully compile and pass all the test-cases to retain your position at the top of the leader-board. So polish up your coding skills to win cash prizes. 

1. Go to Codechef login and regsiter for the contest "CODEWAR".

 2. The contest will be from 20th september,2016 8:00 pm onwards to 22nd september,2016 till 8:00 pm. 

 3. Participation will be Individual.

 4. There will be eight questions of different difficulties.

 5. Winner will be selected according to the leaderboard.
 	So come and win the epic battle of coding.
Write to inspire not to impress

Come participate and bring out the artist in you.

 Do you want to express your feelings by painting the face of one of your lovable friend? If yes, then this is the exact platform for you to express how you think about certain things and also your general ideas about life and everything which is encountered. So participate, emblazon your talent and win this sparkling title of tattoo maker.

 1) We will provide you with water colors and paint brushes (2 max for every participant). But if you wish to bring your own brushes,glitter or other accessories feel free to do so. Sky is the limit.
 2) The CATEGORIES are:
 					a) Your Favorite Manga or Anime Character. 
 					b) Cartoon Network Characters Revisited. 
 					c) Meme Faces. 
 					d) Cartoon Graffitis.

 3) Participant will have to bring a willing accomplice upon whom they will paint.

 4) They will have to explain their creation to the judges so their tattoo should be meaningful and should belong to any one of the categories mentioned above.

 5) Time : 1hour.

ACE THE BRAIN RACE

 How well is your General knowledge? Are you aware of latest competitions and changes happening across the globe? Now the platform has come to your way to assess your awareness from all categories. This factful event provides you a great opportunity to unveil your talent, ability and skills by fighting in war of minds . Now stir yourself, spike your knowledge and run your brains to conquest this marathon of mind.

 Talent hits a target no one else can hit, Genius hits a target no one else can see. So guys time to shake your brains up!!! Get the best out of yourself. As The Quiz always floats slightly above the ground!!! And only you can do it. Here you go 
 Rules:

 1) The questions for quiz are based on general knowledge, current affairs.

 2) There will be only 1 round, which is paper based.

 3) 30 questions of 3 marks each. There will be no negative marking.

 4) Two members in each team.

 5) There will be strict prohibition on any source like internet for help.

Fire in the hole

 Are you interested in Gaming? Yes ?,then this is the appurtenant opportunity for you to concur in this first person shooter game. Each team attempts to complete their mission objective and/or eliminate the opposing team. So gear up guys for this amazing event, cash prizes are waiting for you.

 Round:			 1 minute 45 seconds cycle on a map.

 Match:			First team to win 7 total rounds, or the single overtime round.

 Overtime:			In the case of a 6-6 score at the end of regulation play, 3 overtime rounds will be played. The start money for each team will be set at $10000 per player for overtime.


 Game Format:

 Competition Method:	5 vs. 5

 Players:			10 total (5 on each team)

 Rounds:			12 rounds for regulation play

 Max Rounds Format:			6 rounds as Offense, and 6 rounds as Defense per team until the victory condition is met
 Victory Condition:			The first team to win 6rounds in regulation or the team that wins the overtime period.

 Buy time:			15 seconds

 Start money:			$800 for regulation play, $10,000 for overtime periods

 Freeze time:			5 seconds

 C4 Timer:			35 seconds

 Map Pool:
 					• de_dust,de_dust2, de_inferno, de_nuke, de_train
 
 Side Selection:
 					• By knife round / coin toss, at admin discretion
 					• At half time, teams will switch sides
 					• All players names must be in the format of their team tag + gaming alias 
 (i.e. TEAM | Player)
 
 Setup and Configuration:
 					•Non-standard game settings or third party applications that affect game play are not permitted.
 					•Players are restricted from opening the console.

Not all gold glitters 

Bring out the Bond in you. Solve the riddles at each stage as fast as you can, or opt for some alternative tasks. Knowledge of the campus, and shortcuts routes from one location to another can help you reach the destinations faster. Be the team covering the maximum number of destination points within the stipulated time period to be the winners!

Unleash The ‘Geekzmo’ in You…

 Are you a Gadget freak? Always google in searching latest technology advancements? If yes, then participate in this geeky event to analyse your knowledge about technology gadgets with our trivia challenge. So come, put your skills to the test in this ultimate gadget quiz and win exciting cash prizes.

 Rules:
 This events for specially for who loves the gadget’s.. The whole event based on latest Gadget ‘s.
 1.	There will be team of two members.

 2.	Whole event will be completed in two rounds. 

 3.	The first round is Paper based. there will be 20 question based on latest gadgets. Time limit 20 minutes.

 4.	Second round is App based .. consisting of 20 questions time limit 20 minutes..

Come Steal the Show

 Are you the born-dancer, the oh-so-perfect singer or the actor deserving a standing ovation? Then this is the perfect platform for you to showcase your talents. Come, participate and win the most memorable title of the lot: The Performer of the Year.

 1. Performances should not exceed 4 minutes.

 2. Only individual performances allowed.

 3. Performances can include acting, singing, dancing, musical instrument, poetry-recital or stand-up comedy.

 4. Selected performers from the first round will compete against others in a second round.

 5. Performers are to bring their sound tracks, songs, props and other such requisites themseleves.

Back to basics

 Clear your basics in high level languages. If you are the program-freak, this will be a cake walk for you! Check the syntax, predict the outputs and answer some basic questions to earn points.

 1. It is a team event, each team has 2 members.

 2. It will consist of 3 rounds ,round 1 is paper based ,selected team from round 1 goes to round 2, which is app based and shortlisted team will face the third round which is purely based on coding.

 3. Round 1 and 2 will be of 30 minutes each and consist of multiple choice question.

 4. Round 3 is the coding round.

 5. For round 3 participants should bring their own laptops.

Who let The Chaos out?

 Present us with your talent of multitasking and your knowledge of the computer system! Clear out the chaos in your minds, and start brainstorming with your team mates to solve the different aptitude, reasoning and system-based problems to be the ultimate winners. 

Rules:
 1.	There will be team of two members.

 2.	Whole event needs to be completed within two rounds.

 3.	1st round is App based… there will be 30 question based on (Programming, GK , Logical Reasoning ,Computer tricky questions) . Time limit 30 minutes.

 4.	Second round is surprise.
1. \tAll Characters should be in small letters.
2. \tNumbers should be enter in numerical form.
3. \tThere should be no space in words.
4. \tThere is no time limit for any question.
